items.title: Dividend Hikes Offer Optimism Amid Tariff Turmoil
items.description: We profile a pair of blue chips that recently announced dividend hikes, which has turned out to be a broader Q2 theme

items.title: US States Likely to Defy US Downgrade to Keep Top Credit Ratings
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- US states from Florida to North Carolina and Texas would likely hold onto top-notch credit scores from Moody’s Ratings, mostly because they’re in better fiscal shape than the federal government itself. items.title: Meet the Warren Buffett Investment That's Gained 5,502,284% and Looks Set to Soar Even Higher
items.author: The Motley Fool
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment vehicle of Warren Buffett, has generated a staggering 5,502,284% in total returns over the past 60 years, far outpacing the S&P 500. The article suggests that Berkshire Hathaway is well-positioned to continue thriving under the leadership of Greg Abel, who is set to take over from Buffett.
